resources.string: Q.1) Does this application save the captured pictures?
We respect the privacy of users and do not save the captured photos by any means.
Q.2) Will the application include more varieties of banana classification?
Yes, in future with the available public datasets it is possible to include more categories.
Q.3) Can the application run without internet access?
Yes, the compact machine learning models used, run on users mobile device and not on the cloud making it available offline.
